prod: Customers like the sound quality, value, and ease of setup of the speakers. For example, they mention it has good stereo sound separation, it's loud enough for an outdoor environment, and it'll project clear and crisp sounds. Some appreciate bluetooth connectivity, and size. That said, opinions are mixed on performance, and quality.
